content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”inside_page_layout_cover mb_35″][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]We consider our customers a part of our family, which is why we take the atmost care with your garments and ensure complete satisfaction from pick up to drop off. Our services are at true luxury, offered at reasonable price. Now you can enjoy the comfort of having the laundry dine for you, without breaking the bank.

we offer professional Dry cleaning ,Wash and dry,Steam ironing,Alteration service,Sofa Cleaning,Carpet Cleaning,Wedding Dress and Gowns . Our high-quality cleaning services will ensure that your carpets live longer, look as fresh as new after every service, do not stink at all, and most importantly, remain clean, healthy and hygienic

Our Mission

To improve the lives and bring convenience to our clients we serve. To be the most preffered dry-cleaning and laundry out fit through reliability in the work we do.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”67″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
